remarks: Lemma for isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dihmeetlem7.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem7.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem7.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem7.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem7.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihmeetlem7N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( p e. A /\ -. p .<_ Y ) ) -> ( ( ( X ./\ Y ) .\/ p ) ./\ Y ) = ( X ./\ Y ) ) $.
